name.ja: <ruby>秘<rt>ひ</rt></ruby><ruby>密<rt>みつ</rt></ruby><ruby>捜<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>査<rt>さ</rt></ruby><ruby>官<rt>かん</rt></ruby>ミスキャスト

requirement.en: If you have no other monsters on your field, pay 300 LP.

effect.en: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if a Reptile Type monster(s) is among the cards sent, you can add 1 LIGHT Attribute Reptile Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand.
